article_title: Sanders, Clinton coming to Pennsylvania this week
article_text:
PHILADELPHIA (AP) - Both Democratic presidential candidates will be coming to Pennsylvania this week as the commonwealth’s primary election nears.

U.S. Sen. Bernie Sanders announced Sunday that he will travel to State College for a rally Tuesday evening at Penn State.

Hillary Clinton announced earlier that she plans to campaign in Philadelphia on Wednesday. Details of that visit have not yet been announced.

Pennsylvania’s presidential primary is April 26.
